content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Electricity Generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore Pump (position -11.5, 26.5)
- Small Electric Poles (positions -16.5, 19.5 and -19.5, 22.5)
- Pipe Groups connecting the boiler and offshore pump to the steam engine

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### Pipe Groups
Consists of multiple pipe groups connecting various entities for fluid transport.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to smelt without ingredients
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to smelt in the furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power connections
- Check that all power-consuming entities (like the steam engine and lab) are properly connected to a power network to avoid power-related errors.
